sentences.en: "Very well," I said, adopting a crisp authoritative tone.
sentences.cn: “很好，”我用干脆的命令性的语气说道。

sentences.en: a crisp green salad
sentences.cn: 脆爽的蔬菜色拉

sentences.en: a crisp white shirt
sentences.cn: 一件挺括的白衬衫

sentences.en: Bake until the pastry is golden and crisp.
sentences.cn: 把油酥糕点烤至金黄酥脆。

sentences.en: Cook the bacon until it begins to crisp.
sentences.cn: 把熏肉烹至酥脆。

sentences.en: Cook the pastry until it is crisp and golden.
sentences.cn: 把油酥面团烤到发脆并呈金黄色。

sentences.en: He crunched through the crisp snow.
sentences.cn: 他咯吱咯吱地踏雪行进着。

sentences.en: He stepped carefully through the crisp deep snow.
sentences.cn: 他小心地走在松脆的、厚厚的雪地里。

sentences.en: He wore a panama hat and a crisp white suit.
sentences.cn: 他戴着一顶巴拿马草帽，穿着一身挺括的白西装。

sentences.en: Her house is light and airy, crisp and clean.
sentences.cn: 她的房子光线充足，空气流通，清新整洁。

sentences.en: I slipped between the crisp clean sheets.
sentences.cn: 我钻到崭新洁净的被单底下。

sentences.en: It was a crisp answer.
sentences.cn: 这回答干脆利落.

sentences.en: Linen raincoats have a crisp, papery feel.
sentences.cn: 尼龙雨衣的手感又干又脆又薄，像纸一样。

sentences.en: She kicked at the crisp leaves at her feet.
sentences.cn: 她踢着脚边松脆的树叶。

sentences.en: Stir-fry the vegetables until crisp.
sentences.cn: 将蔬菜煸炒至变脆。

sentences.en: The air was fresh and crisp.
sentences.cn: 空气清新凉爽。

sentences.en: The air was thin and crisp, filled with hazy sunshine and frost.
sentences.cn: 空气稀薄清新，其间日光蒙眬，寒气逼人。

sentences.en: The autumn sky is clear and the air is crisp.
sentences.cn: 秋高气爽.

sentences.en: The crisp autumn wind is flickering away.
sentences.cn: 清爽的秋风正在吹拂.

sentences.en: This kind of biscuits is crisp.
sentences.cn: 这种饼干是脆的.

words.tran_cn: 酥脆的；易碎的；干净利落的；生气勃勃的

trans.tran_cn: 脆的，凉爽的，挺括的，咯吱作响的，清晰分明的，简短干脆的

trans.tran_en: a very thin flat round piece of potato that is cooked in oil and eaten cold
to become crisp or make something become crisp by cooking or heating it
